name: 12 Labours of Hercules XIV: Message in a Bottle
name_original: 12 Labours of Hercules XIV: Message in a Bottle
description:
Hercules and Megara peacefully sailed on the ship enjoying the sun and breeze when a strange glowing bottle appeared on the sea surface. Within it lied a message: a desperate call for help. Who could send it? And what happened to this person? Our heroic couple goes in search of answers immediately!



Soon they found a sick, old man sitting on the beach. Hercules barely recognized him as Poseidon! Somebody stole the Sea Master’s divine strength… But who is cunning enough to do this? And what else is he or she capable of?



Hercules has to sort things out, find the villain, save Olympian gods and the whole world… again! Join his fascinating marine investigation in “12 Labours of Hercules XIV: Message in a Bottle”! Yo-ho-ho!



  • Accompany Hercules with a new Game Speed setting!
  • Explore sublevels, bonus levels, super bonus levels and extra super-bonus levels!
  • Interactive guide
  • Wallpapers
  • Additional bonus levels
  • Hercules saving gods
